mapper.sql: id, entity_id, view_id, name, data_type, is_primary, is_foreign
mapper.select: select id,entity_id,view_id,name,data_type,is_primary,is_foreign,is_delete,gmt_create,gmt_modified from attribute where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into attribute
id,
entity_id,
view_id,
name,
data_type,
is_primary,
is_foreign,

mapper.delete: delete from attribute where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
mapper.update:
update attribute
entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
view_id = #{viewId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_primary = #{isPrimary,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_foreign = #{isForeign,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
